I heard some opinions on Kalista, especially at higher ranks, she is not very strong against other adcs like Lucian or corki. she is also not a very good pick in solo q since she relies on her support heavily. in duo queue, it is generally more viable if your partner is support.

i play support (main thresh), and when i tried her, i was playing with a thresh,so my opinions is partially biased, here is my personal experience with kalista:

while she have mobility in combat, she is generally useless in other aspects. to maximise REND, hurricane is really good in a team fight but unfortunately all her other abiilities are no good except for her ulti, but again this relies on communication. it is pointless building any form of movement on her if you have a high Attack Speed other than zerker greaves, if you are roaming through jungle or river, try attacking neutral monster to pop your passive, you can even use this to get in lane. You will probably need quite a few AD items cuz she have bad scaling. If your support is good, just build AD, ATS and ArmPen
